title: Presidential Permit Granted to Cameron County, Texas to Construct, Maintain, and Operate a Pedestrian Border Crossing at the Gateway International Bridge Land Port of Entry
summary: Under his authority as President, the President grants Cameron County, Texas a permit to construct, maintain, and operate a pedestrian border crossing at the Gateway International Bridge Land Port of Entry on the United Statesâ€“Mexico border in Brownsville, Texas. The permit is issued subject to the conditions described in the Presidential Permit Application for the Cameron County Gateway International Bridge and related documentation.
